name: Tomislav Bralić
description: '''Tomislav Bralić''' (born 10 December 1968) is a Croatian singer of [[klapa]] music. He sings in the group, [[Klapa Intrade]], and they are best known for their hit ''Croatio, iz duše te ljubim''. They were on [[Croatia in the Eurovision Song Contest 2009|Dora 2009]] and won the second place.
